Package au.edu.anu.twapps.dialogs

Interface IDialogs

public interface IDialogs
Author Ian Davies - 11 Dec. 2018

Interface for implementation-independent dialogs

  • Method Details

    • errorAlert

      void errorAlert​(String title, String header, String content)
      Present dialog to inform user of an error condition.
      Parameters:
      title - Dialog title
      header - Dialog header (can be null)
      content - Dialog content (can be null)

    • infoAlert

      void infoAlert​(String title, String header, String content)
      Present dialog to supply information to the user.
      Parameters:
      title - Dialog title
      header - Dialog header (can be null)
      content - Dialog content (can be null)

    • warnAlert

      void warnAlert​(String title, String header, String content)
      Present dialog to indicate a warning to the user.
      Parameters:
      title - Dialog title
      header - Dialog header (can be null)
      content - Dialog content (can be null)

    • selectDirectory

      File selectDirectory​(String title, String initialPath)
      Present a dialog for directory selection.
      Parameters:
      title - Dialog title
      initialPath - Initial directory to show.
      Returns:
      Selected directory (null if cancelled).

    • exportFile

      File exportFile​(String title, String promptDir, String promptFileName)
      Dialog to export a file.
      Parameters:
      title - Dialog title
      promptDir - Initial directory.
      promptFileName - Suggested file name.
      Returns:
      File or null if cancelled.

    • yesNoCancel

      YesNoCancel yesNoCancel​(String title, String header, String content)
      A triple-response dialog. YesNoCancel is exposed to prevent dependency on any Javafx classes.
      Parameters:
      title - Dialog title
      header - Dialog header (can be null)
      content - Dialog content (can be null)
      Returns:
      YesNoCancel enum value according to user selection.

    • getText

      String getText​(String title, String header, String content, String prompt, String strValidation)
      Prompts the user for a validated string.
      Parameters:
      title - Dialog title
      header - Dialog header (can be null)
      content - Dialog content (can be null)
      prompt - Suggested text
      strValidation - regex validation string.
      Returns:
      user string or null if cancelled.

    • getExternalProjectFile

      File getExternalProjectFile()
      Dialog to prompt for a file to import into a project.
      Returns:
      File or null if cancelled.

    • confirmation

      boolean confirmation​(String title, String header, String content)
      Creates a confirmation dialog using the given implementation (Javafx or other).

      Parameters:
      title - Dialog title text
      header - Dialog header text (can be null)
      content - Dialog content text (can be null)
      Returns:
      true if action is confirmed by user

    • getOpenFile

      File getOpenFile​(File directory, String title, Object extensions)
      Get a user selected file.
      Parameters:
      directory - Directory to open with
      title - Dialog title
      extensions - Extensions used by the implementation.
      Returns:
      User selected file or null if none selected.

    • editList

      boolean editList​(String title, String header, String content, Object control)
      Presents user with a list of enum options that can be selected or deselected.
      Parameters:
      title - Dialog title
      header - Dialog header (can be null)
      content - Dialog content (can be null)
      control - The control object.
      Returns:
      True if ok clicked, false otherwise

    • getListChoice

      int getListChoice​(String[] list, String title, String header, String content)
      Enables the user to select one string from a list of strings.
      Parameters:
      list - List of strings
      title - Dialog title
      header - Dialog header (can be null)
      content - Dialog content (can be null)
      Returns:
      index of selected string in the list (-1 of user cancels)

    • getRadioButtonChoices

      List<String> getRadioButtonChoices​(String title, String header, String content, List<String[]> entries)
      Presents the user with any number of groups of toggles allowing selection of one from each group.
      Parameters:
      title - Dialog title
      header - Dialog header (can be null)
      content - Dialog content (can be null)
      entries - Group entries with associated options.
      Returns:
      The list of groups with the single selected toggle.

    • owner

      Object owner()
      Get the owning window of the dialog implementation.
      Returns:
      Owning object.

    • promptForSaveFile

      File promptForSaveFile​(File directory, String title, String[]... exts)
      Show a file save dialog.
      Parameters:
      directory - Initial directory
      title - Dialog title
      exts - List of valid file extensions
      Returns:
      The file or null if cancelled.

    • promptForOpenFile

      File promptForOpenFile​(File directory, String title, String[]... exts)
      Show a file open dialog.
      Parameters:
      directory - Initial directory
      title - Dialog title
      exts - List of valid file extensions
      Returns:
      The file or null if cancelled.

    • selectFile

      int selectFile​(List<File> files, int initSelection)
      Select one file from a list of files.
      Parameters:
      files - The file list
      initSelection - zero-based index of initial selection.
      Returns:
      index of new selection.

    • getCBSelections

      List<String> getCBSelections​(String title, String header, List<String> items, List<Boolean> selected)
      Select any number of entries from a list of strings.
      Parameters:
      title - Dialog title
      header - Dialog header (may be null).
      items - Items from which to select.
      selected - Selection status of items.
      Returns:
      The new selection status (may be unchanged)
